ARABIC: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will say, 'Beforehand we used to live in fear among our families.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Saying: "We were also once full of fear at home.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will say: “When we were living before among our kinsfolk we lived in constant fear (of Allah's displeasure).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: saying, "We were afraid while in the world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Saying, “Indeed before this, we were in our houses, worried.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Saying: "Aforetime, we were afraid in the midst of our families."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Saying: Surely we feared before on account of our families:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They say, 'We were before among our people, ever going in fear,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Saying: Lo! of old, when we were with our families, we were ever anxious;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Before this, when we were among our families, we were full of fear of God's displeasure --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They will say: verily we were aforetime, midst our household, ever in dread.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will say, ‘Indeed, aforetime, we used to be apprehensive about our families.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will say: "Aforetime, we were not without fear for the sake of our people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Saying: "Aforetime, we were afraid with our families (from the punishment of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When we were among our people' they will say, 'we were ever fearful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will say, “Before this, we were fearful for our families.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:26] They say, as an intimation of the reason for this attainment: ‘Truly, before, amid our families, in the world, we used to be ever anxious, afraid of God’s chastisement;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Saying: Lo! of old) before entering the Garden, (when we were with our families) in the life of the world, (we were ever anxious) we were fearful of Allah's chastisement;
